CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Conditional/Override** Checked when the Sales Order has generated Invoices as a means to collect payment. Default unchecked. Automatically checked if "Posting Entity" is set to "Invoice".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Conditional/Override** Checked when the Sales Order has generated Invoices as a means to collect payment. Default unchecked. Automatically checked if "Posting Entity" is set to "Invoice".
CustomField.label: Is Invoiced
